Sports: soccer, surfing, skiing, breakdance, capoeira, deadlifts
nyplehre: Apprenticeship in informatics with a focus on systems engineering
toledoDesc: ToledoVR is a action/strategy game for the HTC Vive. Play as a god from the top and fight as a hero on the ground. Playable both in VR and on the PC simultaneously (local multiplayer).
cryptoDesc: A place to read and write reviews and ratings for cryptocurrencies. Each review is verified and good reviews get rewarded.
manageDesc: Goal Manager (discontinued due to high server cost)
portfolioDesc: This website, made from scratch using Angular
variousDesc: Several simple websites created using Wordpress
reportDesc: Tool for the automatic creation of timereports, generated out of Support Tickets (OTRS)
appDesc: Development of internal iOS app @ NYP
xelhaDesc: Dev team / subst. Scrum Master work internal Java / Swing project @ NYP
accautoDesc: Automation of account creation / changes @ NYP
3vol: Employee at 3volutions AG, Bern as software-engineer, work on 3V-ROOMS Software (Backend / Frontend), plan and excecute various small and big projects, work with clients
roomsDesc: Help develop 3V-ROOMS (frontend/backend), planning and execution of various smaller and larger projects. 3V-ROOMS is a software solution to optimize the search and reservation process of rooms and equipment.
hololensDesc: Bachelor Thesis, BSc in Computer Science: With the system created in the thesis consisting of a website for support, a HoloLens application and the server component required for communication, maintenance work on complex machines can be supported remotely worldwide, saving resources and time.
greatSiegeDesc: Project to explore UNITY DOTS Tech stack and various other technologies.
stratigosDesc: Stratigos is a strategy game that combines turn-based and real-time strategy.
shaderDesc: Special shader to display groups of units in strategy games
ue5ProjDesc: Small project to test Unreal 5 capabilities
